CustomField.description: Indicates Product Action Type for the Product Rule. This specific field is used for Adding Implementation SKU automatically using a Product Rule, when a Product is added provided the Product Record has a lookup to the associated Implementation SKU
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates Product Action Type for the Product Rule. This specific field is used for Adding Implementation SKU automatically using a Product Rule, when a Product is added provided the Product Record has a lookup to the associated Implementation SKU
CustomField.label: Add Implementation Service
